faq.answer:
我们提供以下医疗服务：

🏥 针灸， 中医， 按摩， 拔火罐

详细服务请咨询我们的医生。

faq.question: 首次就诊须知
faq.answer:
首次就诊请准备：

📋 驾照

📄 既往病历资料
💰 现金或银行卡

⏰ 建议提前15分钟到达
📝 填写基本信息表
👨‍⚕️ 医生会详细询问病史

faq.title: 🤔 Does acupuncture hurt?
faq.payload: Most people feel little or no pain. You may notice a brief, mild sensation when the sterile, single-use needle is inserted.

faq.title: 🛡️ Is acupuncture safe?
faq.payload: Yes — when performed by a licensed practitioner. We use sterile, single-use, disposable needles and follow strict hygiene protocols.

faq.title: 📆 How many sessions will I need?
faq.payload: It depends on your condition, severity, and how your body responds. Some feel relief after one session; others may need a series. Your acupuncturist will create a personalized plan.

faq.title: 📝 What should I do before my appointment?
faq.payload: Eat a light meal, wear loose clothing, and arrive a few minutes early so you can relax before treatment.

faq.title: ⏱️ How long is a typical session?
faq.payload: The first visit usually lasts 45–60 minutes, including consultation and treatment. Follow-up visits are typically 30–45 minutes.

faq.title: 💳 Can I use my insurance?
faq.payload: Many insurance plans cover acupuncture for certain conditions. We can help verify your coverage and explain your benefits before your first appointment.

faq.title: ⚠️ Are there any side effects?
faq.payload: Minor bruising, light bleeding, or temporary soreness at a needle site can happen but usually resolve quickly.

faq.title: ➕ Can I combine acupuncture with other treatments or medications?
faq.payload: Yes — acupuncture is often used alongside conventional medicine, physical therapy, or chiropractic care. Please inform your acupuncturist about any treatments or medications you’re taking.

faq.title: 😌 What if I’m afraid of needles?
faq.payload: Our practitioners are gentle and explain each step. Many people who were nervous at first end up finding sessions relaxing.

faq.question: 健康体检
faq.answer:
我们提供全面的健康体检服务：

🔍 基础体检：血压、血糖、心电图
🩸 血液检查：血常规、生化全套
📷 影像检查：X光、B超、CT
👁️ 专科检查：眼科、口腔科

💰 体检套餐：从基础到全面，价格优惠
📅 预约体检：请提前1-2天预约

faq.question: 医保报销
faq.answer:
医保报销说明：

🏥 我们已接入医保系统
💳 支持医保卡直接结算
📋 报销比例：根据医保政策
📄 需要材料：医保卡、身份证

💡 具体报销比例请咨询收费处或拨打医保咨询热线。

details.policy: 初诊建议提前 10 分钟到店填写表格，24 小时内可免费改期一次

categories.name: 服务项目
categories.description: 诊所提供的医疗服务项目

treatments: 针灸治疗（疼痛管理、内科调理、压力/睡眠问题）

details.note: 针灸诊所不提供急诊服务。如遇胸痛、呼吸困难、突发剧痛或其他危急症状，请立即拨打 911 或前往最近医院急诊。
details.after_hours: 非营业时间可留言或发送邮件，我们会在下一个工作日联系您。

details.before_visit: 建议就诊前吃少量食物，不要空腹；穿宽松衣物方便针灸。
details.during_visit: 初诊包含咨询和治疗，约 45–60 分钟；复诊约 30–45 分钟。
details.after_visit: 治疗后可稍作休息，避免剧烈运动或饮酒。

details.lead_practitioner: Dr. David Cai, L.Ac — 拥有 30+ 年临床经验，擅长疼痛康复与整体调理
team: Dr. Yeo, L.Ac — 专注内科与压力管理
Dr. Wong, L.Ac — 运动损伤与康复针灸

details.offer: 提供基础健康评估、姿势分析与生活方式指导，帮助制定个性化调理方案。
